intro: Push the Limits of Strength with a Dedicated Game Console AI!
description:
This Go game software features a "game console-exclusive AI" optimized purely for strength and analytical power, focusing on match functionality.

● 14 Levels of Difficulty from Beginner to 4 Dan
The computer's strength is divided into 14 levels.
You can play against opponents tailored to your skill level, ranging from "Beginner" for newcomers to "4th Dan" for those seeking the ultimate challenge.

●"Analysis"  Feature that shows how the AI would play.
The AI analyzes your game and displays suggested moves to show how it would play in your position.
Select your thinking level from "1 Dan" to "4 Dan" and display [win rate display] and [good move/bad move display].
From the graph for each move, you can find out which moves led to wins and losses, and where improvements are needed.
Winning rate display: Displays the winning rate analyzed by AI in a graph for each move.
Good/bad move display: AI analyzes the moves you made and displays good/bad moves.

● "Reading Lines" Feature to View the Basis of Suggested You can view the reasoning behind the AI's suggested moves through its Reading Lines.
Select thinking levels from 1 Dan to 4 Dan and preview sequences 3, 5, 7, 9, or 11 moves ahead.
This helps clarify why the AI made certain decisions.

● Additional Features
Joseki Display: Shows common opening patterns.
Hint Function: Provides suggestions during the game.
2-Player Matches: Play against another person.
Real-Time Territory Estimation: Displays territory as the game progresses.
Game Record Save and Load: Save your game records or resume a game from a saved state.
Game Record Input: Manually input moves for review or analysis.
